title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.1 - Prohibited Practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.1 - Prohibited Practices

State Regulations

No employer shall prohibit an employee from inquiring
about, discussing, or disclosing the wages of such employee or other employee, except as otherwise provided herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
194-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
